Personage is a one-page beautiful resume theme which is a combination of latest web technologies with modern and clean design. Almost all the elements are professionally animated, so it gives your website a live feeling and your visitors will enjoy browsing your website even more. Live animation + your motivated resume will change your future!

item.title: PHOTOGRAPHY STUDIO
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Like always, we once again prepared to follow Puddhu Bar for the current year and into 2013. We barely had the time to finish this season’s poster that the City of Torino shut down most of the Murazzi’s clubs. After an ironic “funeral”, we can only wait for the center of the Torino nightlife to come back to life once again. “The Dreamers” drum’n bass is the city’s venue for lovers of this genre. The 2009-2010 communication was accompanied by a series of 10 anamorphisms painted in abandoned places, a reminiscence of DnB’s underground roots.

item.title: VISUAL ART EXIBITION
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Separated they live in Bookmarksgrove right at the coast of the Semantics, a large language ocean. A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia. Even the all-powerful Pointing has no control about the blind texts it is an almost unorthographic life One day however a small line of blind text by the name of Lorem Ipsum decided to leave for the far World of Grammar.

item.title: ATLETIES BEACH DREAM
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Decoration for Acqua Alaties Beach resort in Kefalonia, meeting place for travellers from all over the world. A map of places seen or to be visited, to exchange stories while chilling at the best “place for dreamers” in the world! Project realized in collaboration with Ctrl-Arch Architettura. Check out the resort’s branding.

item.title: ROLLAND CAMPAIGN
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: "The Dreamers" drum'n bass is the city's venue for lovers of this genre. The 2009-2010 communication was accompanied by a series of 10 anamorphisms painted in abandoned places, a reminiscence of DnB's underground roots.

item.title: VARIOUS ARTISTS
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: What I find especially successful about this campaign is a combination of well thought-out factors. One, the casting couldn’t have been more spot on. Dean Winters—from shows like Oz and 30 Rock—really epitomizes the Mayhem persona. He wears a suit but looks like he just got out of a bar fight. He’s calm and straightforward about the destruction he causes and that matter-of-factness really hits home—especially when Winters literally hits homes. Or cars. Or motorcycles.

A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia.

item.title: ARCTIC/ SLEEPING AT LAST
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: From July 14-17, the Order of Architects in Torino organized the 2011 Architettura in Città Festival. Art, cinema, theater, dance, literature, photography and music dialogue with architecture, design and the city, through projects by over 50 cultural organizations from Torino and its province. We took care of the mounting for the Infopoint at the majestic Bertalazone di San Fermo Palace in central Torino. The graphic project was curated by Lorem - LOREM - Graphic Design and Communication under the supervision of HOUSEDADA, reproducing amongst other things the festival's logo in anamorph technique. Truly design is amongst the initiative's technical sponsors.

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Like always, we once again prepared to follow Puddhu Bar for the current year and into 2013. We barely had the time to finish this season's poster that the City of Torino shut down most of the Murazzi's clubs. After an ironic "funeral", we can only wait for the center of the Torino nightlife to come back to life once again.

item.title: Work Published in Design
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. Separated they live in Bookmarksgrove right at the coast of the Semantics, a large language ocean. A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia. It is a paradisematic country, in which roasted parts of sentences fly into your mouth. Even the all-powerful Pointing has no control about the blind texts it is an almost unorthographic life One day however a small line of blind text by the name of Lorem Ipsum decided to leave for the far World of Grammar.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Wow that looks incredible! Great idea and well done!!

item.title: Work Published in Los Logos
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: This identity inspiration book series is always a great collection of contemporary logos and can be found in designer and agency bookshelves everywhere. So it is a great honor to have one of my logos published within its covers.

item.title: A SHORT FILM BY BEN BRIEND
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
I typically dislike it when creatives use the negative to sell a product, as often times the ideas aren’t as sophisticated and rely on immature or brash imagery and tone to share a message. It can be funny, sure, but also can leave a neutral or sour taste about the brand. The Mayhem character is not a new one to the advertising world; bad guys who are stopped by the advertised product have definitely been successful in the past. It just seems that a great example of such a technique hasn’t appeared in a while.

What I find especially successful about this campaign is a combination of well thought-out factors. One, the casting couldn’t have been more spot on. Dean Winters—from shows like Oz and 30 Rock—really epitomizes the Mayhem persona. He wears a suit but looks like he just got out of a bar fight. He’s calm and straightforward about the destruction he causes and that matter-of-factness really hits home—especially when Winters literally hits homes. Or cars. Or motorcycles.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: What music is being used in the background of “Freelance Promotion”? And who has done the voiceover, link to the freelancer? Thanks

item.title: TOM MCRIDE
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: My take on this is that the speeds of the Calatrava "Brise Soleil" opening and the wind turbines are OK because, like a lot of elements in this work, they are done as if shot in time lapse.

item.title: MSN UK'S London Office
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: We opened up the reception letting in lots of natural light and added floor to ceiling double doors that showed the busy working office beyond so that there was an immediate connection to the action. The different working zones created allow for people to use the space in a variety of working modes – relaxed lounge style client waiting/greeting areas; café bar style work stations for short meetings and collaborating over coffee; small hubs for more intimate or focused meetings; large communal tables with benches for larger groups. The space is also designed to be used as a whole for company gatherings and events.

item.title: A SHORT FILM ABOUT CAMERA
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: From July 14-17, the Order of Architects in Torino organized the 2011 Architettura in Città Festival. Art, cinema, theater, dance, literature, photography and music dialogue with architecture, design and the city, through projects by over 50 cultural organizations from Torino and its province.  We took care of the mounting for the Infopoint at the majestic Bertalazone di San Fermo Palace in central Torino. The graphic project was curated by Lorem - LOREM - Graphic Design and Communication under the supervision of HOUSEDADA, reproducing amongst other things the festival's logo in anamorph technique.  Truly design is amongst the initiative's technical sponsors.
